org.drombler.acp.core.action.spi

Interface ToolBarContainerListener<ToolBar,ToolBarButton>

  • Type Parameters:
    ToolBar - the GUI-toolkit specific type of a tool bar
    ToolBarButton - the GUI-toolkit specific base type of a tool bar button.
    All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ToolBarContainerListenerAdapter

    public interface ToolBarContainerListener<ToolBar,ToolBarButton>
extends EventListener
    A ToolBarContainer listener. TODO: more methods might be added in future
